extends Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  ChatServer.ClientThread
      Thread for TCP Communication Thread listens for incoming messages and sends out message to all clients
      (package private) class  ChatServer.UDPThread
      Thread for UDP Communication Thread listens for incoming messages and sends out message to all clients

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatServer

        public ChatServer()
